original_text: And upon the golden altar they shall spread a cloth of blue, and cover it with a covering of badgers' skins, and shall put to the staves thereof:
korean_text: 금제단 위에 청색 보자기를 펴고 해달의 가죽 덮개로 덮고 그 채를 꿰고

sentences.original_text: they shall spread a cloth of blue
and cover it with a covering of badgers' skins
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 오소리 가죽 덮개로 그것을 덮을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and shall put to the staves thereof
